solution_line_template: Her original recipe makes {original_dozens} dozen and she only needs {desired_dozens} dozen so she needs to reduce the recipe by {original_dozens}/{desired_dozens} = <<{original_dozens}/{desired_dozens}={reduction_factor}>>{reduction_factor}

For {desired_dozens} dozen cookies, she needs to reduce her recipe by {reduction_factor} and the original called for {original_butter_pounds} pounds of butter so she now needs {original_butter_pounds}/{reduction_factor} = {butter_needed} pound of butter
